directions: Place potatoes in a gallon-size Glad® Food Storage Bag and add oil; seal bag. Toss to coat. Add Dressing & Seasoning Mix and toss again until coated. Bake in ungreased baking pan at 450°F for 30 to 35 minutes or until potatoes are brown and crisp.
ingredients: 1 packet (1 ounce) Hidden Valley® Original Ranch Salad® Dressing & Seasoning Mix
title: Original Ranch Roasted Potatoes
